name: Battle Cars (itch) (Joe George, Winona Eden, Tyrel2603, tasty_lettuce, DD101)
name_original: Battle Cars (itch) (Joe George, Winona Eden, Tyrel2603, tasty_lettuce, DD101)
description:
Battle Cars was created over a 5 day university game jam, by a mix of some experienced (and fresh faced) students of game design. We were tasked with making  an imaginative game based on what 19th Century folk may have imagined sports of the future to be.

Destroy enemy cars and get the high score!

Credits:

Manuel Guttieri - Team Captain, 3D Modelling, Particles, Audio

Joe George - Production, 3D Modelling, Programming, UI

Josh Jo-Nes - Programming

Winona Nonato - 3D Modelling, Concept Art

Amelia Lazouras - 2D Art

Dylan Hart - 2D Art

Red Ahmed - 2D Art

Marvin Iley - Audio

Alex Campos John - Audio

Tyrel - Audio

Kasim Estwick - Presentation
